name: Simplerage
description: Hey guys! this is a demo for a game im producing called Simplerage, it will be a ragegame and will have a plethra of levels, atleast 100, its going to be a game to spend your time raging trying to beat it, but you never will because I will keep producing more levels as long as this game gets supported. at the moment though, this is a demo. - Disclaimer - May not work on any browser other than Microsoft Edge or Firefox.
